entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Periods of rain beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Monday 10 April 2023
